mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notice(user_id, title, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT n.id, (SELECT name FROM USER WHERE id = n.user_id) AS userId, n.title, n.content, n.created_at, n.updated_at, f.path, f.type FROM Notice n LEFT JOIN Notice_File f ON n.id = f.notice_id WHERE n.id = #{noticeId} AND n.is_deleted = 0;
SELECT * FROM Notice_Read WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND notice_id = #{noticeId} AND is_deleted = 0;
SELECT id, name, department FROM User WHERE id IN (SELECT user_id FROM Notice_Read WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} AND is_deleted = 0)

SELECT id, name, department FROM User WHERE department NOT IN (SELECT target FROM Notice_Target WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} AND is_deleted = 0) AND id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM Notice_Read WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} AND is_deleted = 0);
SELECT target FROM Notice_Target WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} AND is_deleted = 0;
SELECT id, user_id, title, content FROM Notice WHERE id = #{noticeId} AND is_deleted = 0;
mapper.update: UPDATE Notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE Notice_Target SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
UPDATE Notice_Read SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
UPDATE Notice SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{noticeId};
